overview_of_class: This course explores the logic and methods of social research, qualitative and quantitative analysis of social data, and ethical, political, and policy issues in social research, and provides foundation for further work in social research. This course combines classroom lecture and discussion with an online component in a five-week intensive format. In-class sessions will be held on 1/7, 1/21, 2/4. This course is part of the Business Leadership year two cohort. First class attendance is mandatory.
name: Sociological Analysis
title: SCS SOCIOL 226-CN-17 Sociological Analysis
